title: RSA Breach, Part 2
description: In the wake of RSA's disclosure of the breach, the company cyber analysts chose not to boot the attackers of their network - but followed their activities closely, trying to figure out their identities and motives. For the first time since the actual breach, a decade ago, we'll get the (surprising) answers to those questions - and more.
content:encoded:
In the wake of RSA’s disclosure of the breach, the company cyber analysts chose not to boot the attackers off their network – but followed their activities closely, trying to figure out their identities and motives. For the first time since the actual breach, a decade ago, we’ll get the (surprising) answers to those questions – and more.

A special collaboration with Wired magazine, exposing – for the first time – the untold story behind one of the most dramatic hacks of all time.
itunes:subtitle: In the wake of RSA's disclosure of the breach, the company cyber analysts chose not to boot the attackers of their network - but followed their activities closely, trying to figure out their identities and motives.
itunes:summary: In the wake of RSA's disclosure of the breach, the company cyber analysts chose not to boot the attackers of their network - but followed their activities closely, trying to figure out their identities and motives. For the first time since the actual breach, a decade ago, we'll get the (surprising) answers to those questions - and more.
itunes:author: Cybereason
